title: The Last Unforgiven: Cursed
description: Every villain has a backstory.A millennium is a dreadfully long time to walk the Earth, and memories that last a lifetime are doubly cursed for Raim, the longest serving Grand Master.Unlike the rest of the Incubi, he doesn’t get the oblivion of Deep Sleep. Instead, he lives through every day of each century, with vivid memories that torment him throughout the endless ages…Of her, the only woman who ever stirred feelings in his heart.Of him, the only Incubus who ever had his complete trust.Of their betrayal, and the way he lost them both…Every villain has a backstory.This one is Raim’s.Warning: The Last Unforgiven: Cursed is not a Romance. It’s the backstory of a villain. There is no HEA. He hasn’t earned it. Not yet.Intended for mature readers.
author: Marina Simcoe
